msg: Apply workaround to accept Ok instead of Multistatus for ReportMethod

msg: Apply workaround to accept Ok instead of Multistatus for ReportMethod

author: ozeigermann
msg: Added parameter that defers saving of XML "blobs" to file system until
tx gets into prepare phase. This reduces the number of XML serializaitions
of descriptors to disk to at most one per tx and resource. The option is
switched off by default, as it breaks the HACK for bug #26913.
